Plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.
Title: The Untouchables
Writer: Oscar Fraley (suggested by book), Eliot Ness (suggested by book), David Mamet
Actors: Kevin Costner, Sean Connery, Charles Martin Smith, Andy Garcia
tomatoConsensus: Slick on the surface but loaded with artful touches, Brian DePalma's classical gangster thriller is a sharp look at period Chicago crime, featuring excellent performances from a top-notch cast.
